summary: Makes Alduin the final boss he is.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#1e84cc][size=6]The Ultimate Finale-TUF

[/size][/color]Hello Ladies and gents to my new and first Skyrim Mod

So what does this mod do. Well it makes the final boss Alduin more difficult and scary like he should be. Now it does't make him look any different there's already many mods that do that I recommend Imprefvicticious Alduin. Anyway this mod only makes Alduin harder and you have to have All the DLC Deadly Dragons and The Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch for this mod to work. NOTE THIS MOD WAS MADE WITH SKYRE INSTALLED SO I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THAT MOD! 

I have only changed Alduin's health the required mods do the rest.
 He now regenerates his health a little faster and his health has been increased by 300 percent 

PS you really should have the Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch if your playing skyrim so just install it.[/center][center] [/center]
author: Varlocks
